name: MokMok
description:
MokMok is a musical adventure. A unique experience set in a bizarre world, inhabited by Mok´s - living musical instruments.

Discover the quirky creatures of MokMok. Each Mok is an instrument, which jumps and vibrates to the beat it plays. Together they perform interactive songs.
Take part in a funky adventure. Discover mystical rituals and ancient tunes.
Get Episode 1 today and experience music like never before.

MokMok is made by 2Beats with love.
